original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 10.7. Kusalattika, Mahantaraduka
analyzed: kusalattika mahantaraduka

original: Nakusalaṁ nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kusalam na sa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Nakusalaṁ naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na anārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate catuvīsa

original: Nakusalaṁ nacittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ, nanocittapadaṁ na labbhati.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na cittam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta na no citta padam na labbhati hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na cetasikam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate aṭṭhārasa

original: Nakusalaṁ nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nacittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Nakusalaṁ nacittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate aṭṭhārasa

original: Nakusalaṁ nacittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ
analyzed: na kusalam na citta anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhum dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nakusalaṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pe na kusalam na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate aṭṭhārasa

original: Nakusalaṁ naajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na ajjhattikam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ nabāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kusalam na bāhiram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Nakusalaṁ naupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na aupādāḥ dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ naupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na aupādinnam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kusalam na anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava
